data.actual_result: A newline is inserted into whatever message was being typed, even in an empty message.
data.expected_result: Either sending the message that was in the text field as normal or nothing.
data.short_description: Minor bug: Newline created in textfield after opening a menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the reactions menu on a message, or add a reaction, or click on a user, or click on options for another message - Press Enter once (while mouse isn't hovered over something selectable like a reaction in the reaction menu) -
